ppy/osu-framework.summary: Recent activities in osu-framework include updates to the FFmpeg build process, specifically using the `macos-13` CI image to replace the deprecated `macos-12` image, ensuring compatibility with older macOS versions. These changes were made through a series of push and pull requests, including the merge of pull request #6473, which addressed the deprecation issue and enhanced the build process.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository has seen activities focused on enhancing gameplay and editor interactions, including the addition of failing assertions and the implementation of a feature to pause playback when entering gameplay test from the editor. These updates were facilitated through push and pull requests, such as the merge of pull request #31303, which directly addressed and resolved issue #312, improving the overall user experience.

ppy/s3-nginx-proxy.summary: Recent activities in the s3-nginx-proxy repository involve preserving upstream Cache-Control headers, as seen in the merge of pull request #6. This update aims to enhance the proxy's functionality by maintaining the original caching instructions provided by the upstream server, ensuring better cache management and potentially improving performance.
